participants.name: Shelby D. Crow
participants.title: Connecting high performing companies with top IT talent

messages.message:
Hi Brian-
Thank you for accepting my LinkedIn invitation! I wanted to take the initiative to find out if you might have an interest in hearing about an opportunity in Chandler, AZ that is potentially stronger than your current position. Do you have time for a quick call tomorrow morning on your way to work or in the afternoon? 
I look forward to hearing back. 
Shelby
Yes! Have you already interviewed there?

Haha no. They are just interviewing to justify H1B visas because they have to prove no one locally is willing to blindly follow orders. You're also the 15th recruiter to tell me about this company so their relationships must be short lived.
Ohhh I appreciate the insight. What recruiting companies are reaching out? I was under the impression there were only a couple working on this.
Another from concentric, envy resources, just at a glance.
Okay, well I appreciate your time and feedback!
